latest.title: Director/PDMR Shareholding
latest.content:
14 Jan 2026 16:30
RNS Number : 9323O
Savannah Energy Plc
14 January 2026
14 January 2026
Savannah Energy PLC
("Savannah" or "the Company")
Director/PDMR Dealings
Savannah Energy PLC, the British independent energy company focused around the delivery of
Projects that Matter
, announces that it has been notified of three transfers, totalling 135,261,638 Ordinary Shares in the Company, between companies beneficially owned by Andrew Knott, Chief Executive Officer and a Director of the Company. Accordingly, there has been no change in Andrew Knott's beneficial ownership of the Ordinary Shares of the Company, which remains at 13.81%. The transfers are being undertaken to consolidate Andrew Knott's shareholdings in the Company into a single company owned by him.
The information contained in this notification is disclosed in accordance with the requirements of Article 19 of the Market Abuse Regulation.

latest.title: Update on Relationship Agreement with NIPCO Plc
latest.content:
13 Jan 2026 07:01
RNS Number : 5886O
Savannah Energy Plc
13 January 2026
13 January 2026
Savannah Energy PLC
("Savannah" or "the Company")
Update on Relationship Agreement with NIPCO Plc
Savannah Energy PLC, the British independent energy company focused around the delivery of
Projects that Matter
,
notes that, further to its 30 December 2025 announcement, regulatory consultation on the proposed relationship agreement between the Company and NIPCO Plc has completed. The relationship agreement has, therefore, been entered into with NIPCO Plc on the terms described in the 30 December 2025 announcement.
For further information, please refer to the Company's website www.savannah-energy.com or contact:
Savannah Energy
